*sigh* I am very sorry to hear that Minime is gone. He was a very 
good person to RP with, one of the best in fact. I'll certainly miss 
him.

I will also participate in the day of silence, and I will put up a 
memorial on the Members page. However, I didn't know Minime 
personally, I only RPed with him, so I will need some help making the 
memorial.
